mapper.select: SELECT s.code , s.name , sv.view , sp.price FROM stock AS s JOIN stock_views AS sv ON s.code = sv.stock_code JOIN ( SELECT stock_code , price FROM stock_price WHERE (stock_code , create_time) IN( SELECT stock_code , MAX(create_time) FROM stock_price GROUP BY stock_code )) as sp ON s.code = sp.stock_code ORDER BY sv.view DESC
